get.summary: File search
get.description: Search for media files offered for selling. See details here.

post.description: Search for media files offered for selling. See details here.

parameters.name: similar_image
parameters.description: image data to use for visual similarity search. Use multipart/form-data. Ignored if search_parameters[similar_url] is specified.

parameters.name: search_parameters[words]
parameters.description: Keyword search (words can also be media_id, e.g. #20 #21 #22)

parameters.name: search_parameters[filters][panoramic:on]
parameters.description: Panoramic images (can be combined with orientation)

parameters.name: search_parameters[filters][colors]
parameters.description: Comma separated listed of hexadecimal colors (without any # prefix)

parameters.name: search_parameters[filters][mogrt_source]
parameters.description: Comma separated listed of mogrt sources (aegraphic or prgraphic or both)

parameters.name: search_parameters[filters][mogrt_api_version]
parameters.description: mogrt api version such as 1.3, 1.4, 1.5. (Negative number is invalid)

parameters.name: search_parameters[filters][area_m_pixels]
parameters.description: Range in mega pixels such as 0-1, 10-50

parameters.name: search_parameters[filters][mobile_compatibility_version]
parameters.description: mobile compatibility version of mogrt. (An example 201710)

parameters.name: search_parameters[filters][image_width]
parameters.description: Width of an image in pixels. Min and max are optional and default to open ranges. An example of a range is 250-450

parameters.name: search_parameters[filters][image_height]
parameters.description: Height of an image in pixels. Min and max are optional and default to open ranges. An example of a range is 250-450

parameters.name: result_columns[]
parameters.description: Fields you want to have included in the search result ('is_licensed' requires authentication)

get.summary: Bulk file data retrieval
get.description: Retrieve media files in bulk. See the design document for more details.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of file IDs, e.g. 'ids=100,101'

parameters.name: result_columns[]
parameters.description: Fields you want to have included in the search result ('is_licensed' requires authentication)

get.summary: Category details.
get.description: Retrieve category details by the provided id. See details here.

get.summary: Retrieve templates from Adobe Stock.
get.description: Retrieve templates. See the design document for more details.

parameters.name: product
parameters.description: Templates will be returned based on product identifier and version. Example: PHXS/15.2.0

nb_results.description: Total number of media files found

media_type_id.description: Type of media (1 - photo, 2 - illustration, 3 - vector, 4 - video, 7 - template)

vector_type.description: If the file is a vector indicates if its a svg or a ai/eps (reported as zip)

content_type.description: Content type of the file (e.g. image/jpeg)

duration.description: Video duration. If null then this response column was requested for an asset that is not a video.

framerate.description: Video framerate. If null then this response column was requested for an asset that is not a video.

details_url.description: URL to AdobeStock with content details

video_preview_url.description: URL to the regular video preview

video_preview_width.description: Width of the regular video preview in pixels

video_preview_height.description: Height of the regular video preview in pixels

video_preview_content_length.description: File size of the regular preview in bytes

video_preview_content_type.description: Content type (i.e. MIME type) of the regular preview

video_small_preview_url.description: URL to the small video preview

video_small_preview_width.description: Width of the small video preview in pixels

video_small_preview_height.description: Height of the small video preview in pixels

video_small_preview_content_length.description: File size of the small preview in bytes

video_small_preview_content_type.description: Content type (i.e. MIME type) of the small preview

url.description: URL to download watermarked comp file

Response.Categories.description: A list of 1th level child categories

link.description: Relative URL pointing to category page at AdobeStock

has_overage.description: Flag whether overage is available for this entitlement
Flag whether overage is available for this entitlement

is_default_entitlement.description: True if this entitlement is the default one for given user

nb_pages.description: Total number of pages (50 allotments per page)
Total number of pages (50 downloads per page)

file_url.description: Absolute URL to download the file

stock_id.description: Member id or content.id32 plus member id if content has been downloaded (e.g. '6521' or 'h7JeafbSdXXVdnELwREfbg1zrgfqbxr8,6521')

license_type_id.description: License type of combined asset and license

Response.Full_Entitlement_Quota.description: More detailed information about the entitlements quota

credits_quota.description: Available quota for all non core assets. If the entitlement does not have image_quota then credits_quota can also be used for core assets

standard_credits_quota.description: Available agency quota for core images

premium_credits_quota.description: Available agency quota for all non core assets

universal_credits_quota.description: Available agency quota that can be used for any asset

url.description: Jump URL for users without any available entitlement

total.description: total quota bought with a credit pack

available.description: available quota of a credit pack

is_free.description: Set to true if credit pack was added without an order to eComm

tax_included.description: Is tax included in the price

is_gst_supported.description: Is product subject to goods and services tax

download_url.description: URL to download the licensed asset

media_type_id.description: Type of media (1 - photo, 2 - illustration, 3 - vector, 4 - video)

vector_type.description: If the file is a vector indicates if its a svg or a ai/eps (reported as zip)

content_type.description: Content type of the file (e.g. image/jpeg)

details_url.description: URL to AdobeStock with content details

Response.UserLicenseHistory.description: Information about the asset attempting to be licensed and the license

totalQuantity.description: Total quantity = Total quantity of the organization an admin can see, depending on its admin level (Full Admin: Full organization quota; Profile Admin: quota for the license configuration he administrates)

consumedQuantity.description: Consumed quantity = Quantity of quota consumed accross the organization an admin can see, depending on its admin level (Full Admin: Full organization quota; Profile Admin: quota for the license configuration he administrates)

remainingQuantity.description: Remaining quantity = Quantity of quota remaining to distribute across the organization an admin can see, depending on its admin level (Full Admin: Full organization quota; Profile Admin: quota for the license configuration he administrates)

distributedQuantity.description: Distributed quantity = Quantity of quota distributed across the organization an admin can see, depending on its admin level (Full Admin: Full organization quota; Profile Admin: quota for the license configuration he administrates)

undistributedQuantity.description: Undistributed quantity = Quantity of quota undistributed across the organization an admin can see, depending on its admin level (Full Admin: Full organization quota; Profile Admin: quota for the license configuration he administrates)

totalQuantity.description: Total quantity = Total quantity of quota for the Product License Configuration selected

consumedQuantity.description: Consumed quantity = Quantity of quota consumed for the Product License Configuration selected

remainingQuantity.description: Remaining quantity = Quantity of quota remaining to distribute for the Product License Configuration selected

Parameter.Header.Product.name: X-Product
Parameter.Header.Product.description: The X-Product is required to identify the calling product and should always contain a version. The productID should be the IMS clientID if possible. Example: Photoshop/15.2.0

Parameter.Header.Product.Optional.name: X-Product
Parameter.Header.Product.Optional.description: The X-Product is required to identify the calling product and should always contain a version. The productID should be the IMS clientID if possible. Example: Photoshop/15.2.0

Parameter.Header.ProductLocation.name: X-Product-Location
Parameter.Header.ProductLocation.description: The X-Product-Location header is optional and used to identify a location within a product where the call was made. The version is optional. Example: Libraries/1.0.0 or Hello

Parameter.Header.RequestId.name: X-Request-Id
Parameter.Header.RequestId.description: Request Identifier used to trace the request in logs.

Parameter.Get.FulfillmentMethod.name: fulfillment_method
Parameter.Get.FulfillmentMethod.description: Order fulfillment method (to detect right offering)
